description: Love your lips? Then take care of them and spoil yourself with Palmer's line of year round lip care. Enjoy kissable, soft, and smooth lips for a guaranteed great smile and healthy, happy, and hydrated lips. The rich, cream coconut scent found in Palmer’s Coconut Oil Formula Lip Balm is decadent for your chapped lips. This luscious lip balm is made of pure extra virgin coconut oil and monoi oil and sweet almond oil. These oils come together to produce a deluxe lip treatment that provides instant hydration, leaving your lips velvety soft, and supple. SPF 15 protects your lips while the emollient formula provides lasting moisture for your mouth. Proudly made in U.S.A., Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation. America's #1 Coconut Oil Skin Care brand Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula uses the highest quality natural ingredients for superior moisturization head-to-toe.

description: FLEXITOL LIP BALM is formulated to hydrate and soften severely dry, cracked, flaky, chapped, or peeling lips. Flexitol's unique, steroid-free combination of ingredients keeps lips comfortable, smooth, and healthy looking. Suitable for adults (men and women) and children over 12 years of age. Flexitol Lip Balm deeply moisturizes with a special blend containing Lanolin, Urea, Petrolatum, Cacao Butter, Water, and a Lipid Complex (Glyceryl Stearate, Biphenyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Lecithin, Lauryl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, Acetyl Alcohol). Menthol, Camphor, and Clove Leaf Oil relieve discomfort. Flexitol Lip Balm is suitable for dry lips caused by or related to aging, dehydration, exposure to sun, wind, or dry indoor air, acne medications including Accutane, blood pressure or vertigo medications, chemotherapy or radiation treatments, diabetes, eczema, psoriasis, non-fungal angular cheilitis, thyroid disease, allergies, smoking, lip licking, snoring or breathing with an open mouth. Not designed to treat cold sores/fever blisters (herpes simplex), fungal or bacterial cheilitis Does not contain steroids and is not habit-forming/addictive.
features/0: LIP BALM: Flexitol Lip Balm is formulated with 2.5% urea to hydrate & soften severely dry, cracked, flaky, & chapped lips. Our unique, steroid-free balm helps restore soft, healthy-looking lips. Not waxy or sticky.
features/1: PREVENT & TREAT: Help prevent peeling, flaky, itchy lips and relieve painful cracked & chapped lips with this steroid-free formulation. Non-addictive and non-habit forming, menthol & camphor provide cooling relief.
features/2: USAGE & CONDITIONS: Flexitol Lip Balm can be beneficial to those dealing with chapped & peeling lips caused by chemotherapy, Accutane, isotretinoin, orthodontics, braces, lip licking, smoking & dehydration.
features/3: INGREDIENTS: Flexitol products are made with clinically-proven & nourishing ingredients like urea, glycolic acid & lanolin and nourishing ingredients like vitamin E, aloe vera & shea butter.
features/4: SKINCARE SOLUTIONS: Say goodbye to dry, cracked feet, rough hands, very dry skin, & chapped lips. Help maintain healthy skin with Flexitol's range of products including lotions, creams & lip balms.

description: Blistex Medicated Lip balm helps prevent dryness and chapping with an easy glide formula that also soothes irritated lips. Made with three long-lasting protectants and SPF 15 for sun protection, this lip balm is exactly what you need for daily lip care. It seals in lip moisture to prevent drying of lip tissue. Temporarily protects and helps relieve chapped or cracked lips. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply at least every two hours. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Ask a doctor before using on children under two years of age.

breadCrumbs: Beauty & Personal Care › Skin Care › Lip Care › Balms & Moisturizers
description: With its original formula, Vaseline Lip Therapy is a lip balm you can rely on that provides long-lasting relief from dryness, dullness and cracked lips. This everyday essential for healthy-looking lips is made with 100% pure Vaseline Jelly, just like all Vaseline lip care products. Vaseline jelly is the original wonder jelly that has been helping to heal dry skin since 1870, and now you can get all its benefits in a lip balm product exclusively designed for lips. The top, protective layer of skin on your lips is thinner than on the rest of your body, so it needs a lip balm that provides long-lasting moisturization. These formulas help support the natural recovery of your dry lips by locking in moisture for healthy looking lips. And since it comes in a lip balm tube, it's perfect for on-the-go to help fight the elements that can be hard on your lips. Vaseline Lip Therapy Lip Balm Tube is great for safeguarding against dryness caused by weather, so you can be confident that your lips are ready to face the outdoors. Use alone, or in combination, with our other Vaseline products including body lotion, body butter, sprays, lip balms and petroleum jelly. We’re proud to be working with Direct Relief in our mission to promote better skin health for everyone around the world. The Healing Project provides dermatological care, Vaseline Jelly and medical supplies needed to help heal the skin of people affected by poverty or emergencies around the world.

description: ✅ SAY HELLO TO CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY: The Indie Earth B3 Advanced Niacinamide 10% & Zinc 1% Face Serum is a Dermatologically Tested, Non-Comedogenic & Oil-Free Face Serum. It is also 100% Fragrance-free | Mineral oil-free | Artificial perfume-free | Silicones-free | | Parabens-Free | Essential Oils-free and Dyes-free. Formulated at pH 5.5 - 6.5, has a safe & effective formulation that can offer visible difference in 3-6 weeks. ✅ REMOVES & PREVENTS ACNE MARKS & BLEMISHES: Niacinamide works to regulate the amount of acne-causing oil being produced by the glands in your skin. This product can effectively improve the skin defects, repair the reddening skin, even the rough pores, balance the oil secretion, reduce acne, acne marks & blemishes and create the smooth and bright skin for you. description: 💜 Why should I use this product? ✔Anterogen is known for cutting edge research in 3D Human Stem Cell ✔Anterogen’s WHITESILK Cosmetics in Human Stem Cell received patents worldwide from US& EU PATENT (No. US9874574B2, No. EP2425844B1), Japan, Israel, China, Hong Kong, and ten other countries 💜 Smart Science Technology ①Human Stem Conditioned Media US& EU PATENT (No. US9874574B2, No. EP2425844B1 ) ②CAVIAR-25 Nanoliposome Antiaging Technology (Patent no : 10-0475255) : Melanin Control Formula B) Cell REGEN Formula ③Agastache Rugosa Anti-Photoaging Technology (Patent no : 10-1782307) ④BIO-Micro spicule peeling technology(Patent no : 10-1851742) ⑤AQUA-7 Complex(Patent no : 10-1922600) – Multi-Layer Hydration ⑥Skin Barrier Reinforcing & Enhancement Complex (Patent no. : 10-1627850) ⑦Calming/Soothing Care(Patent no : 10-2095988) Lavender-6 Purple Complex  💜 Safety Information 🌿 When you use it for the first time 🍒IMPORTANT - we suggest doing a Patch Test on a small area of skin on your neck to make sure the formula is a good fit for you. 🍒Once you determine there is no problem with the patch test you should (1) Wash your face and then dry (2) Apply a small amount to your entire face, neck and decollete, (3) allow to dry (4) Follow with a moisturizer.

features/2: 💜 INGREDIENTS & BENEFIT 🌿 Improve wider pores, unbalanced skin tone, and dullness of skin 🍎NIACINAMIDE(20%) ― Niacinamide is a soluble vitamin(B3) ingredient It can improve aging and dingy skin texture by mitigating damage from harmful environments 🌿 Radiant & Glowing 🍎This topical Niacinamide will minimize the appearance of pores, and support the skin barrier while leaving you looking radiant and glowing
features/3: 🍎Help Boost Hydration, Collagen Production, Soothes Irritations/Reduces Redness and Antioxidant properties 💧 Multi-Skincare & Blend 🍎A multi-skin care product that can be used alone and in blending or layering with other products (Blend to products such as lotion, cream, etc) 🍒Skin irritation, Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested 🍎PH6.4+/-1%
features/4: 💜 Directions 🍒This product cannot be used with products containing pure vitamin C (ascorbic acid). 🍒Apply a few drops of Niacinamide 20% once or twice daily after cleansing, toning, and exfoliating and before applying moisturizer & makeup. Moisten a cotton ball or pad and apply to face and neck. 🍒For best results, At night, layer with other treatment products as needed and follow with moisturizer; during the day, finish with a sunscreen

description: Discoloration Correcting Serum by Good Molecules 30ml/1ozPromote clear, even skin tone and minimize the appearance of dark spots, scars, and hyperpigmentation with our Discoloration Correcting Serum. Formulated with 3% tranexamic acid and 4% Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), this super serum helps to refine skin tone and texture for a balanced, healthier-looking complexion.See A Difference In Your SkinOur unique formulation consists of two key ingredients: cetyl tranexamate mesylate and niacinamide. Both work together to help lessen discoloration and encourage a balanced and improved appearance of your skin. This includes the appearance of freckles from sun damage, acne scarring, age spots, hyperpigmentation and other forms of discoloration. Since the structure of pure tranexamic acid doesn’t permit it to penetrate the skin barrier, we use special form, 3% TeraCeutic TXVector (cetyl tranexmate mesylate) which has a similar structure to skin lipids allowing it to enter more easily into the skin barrier, providing a steady release of the active compound!The serum also works to combat the appearance of uneven tone and texture, dullness, and enlarged pores with Niacinamide, or B3, often added to serums for its balancing and clearing powers. Niacinamide can also be helpful for those with acne prone skin.Easy Addition To Your Beauty RegimenWe recommend using twice a day, once in the morning and once at night. The Discoloration Correcting Serum is clean and does not contain: fragrance, PEGs, mineral oils, alcohols or ethoxylated ingredients.
features/0: BRIGHT AND BALANCED COMPLEXION: Refine tone and improve texture while nourishing your skin! Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Discoloration Correcting Serum made with powerful ingredients to help your skin repair and replenish!
features/1: VISIBLY IMPROVE HYPERPIGMENTATION AND DARK SPOTS: This serum is hydrating and healing. It is designed to help to improve the appearance of hyperpigmentation, blemish scars, sunspots, and other forms of discoloration.
features/2: PROMOTE CLEAR SKIN TONE: Containing 3% tranexamic acid and 4% Niacinamide, commonly known as B3, this formula is very helpful for those suffering uneven skin tone, enlarged pores, and dull texture.
features/3: PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Apply a few drops to your skin in the morning and at night before oils, moisturizers, and creams. Our serum is powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use.
features/4: GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: This serum is suitable for all skin types, but can be particularly beneficial for those with combination/oily skin. Our serum has a pH of 5.5 and is vegan. It is free from fragrance, PEGs, mineral oils, alcohol and ethoxylated ingredients.

features/0: HYALURONIC ACID + NIACINAMIDE. Hyaluronic acid, also known as HA, is a hydrating agent that absorbs water, retains it, and plumps your skin. Niacinamide is an antioxidant that helps build ceramides, aids skin repair and hydrates the skin and can reduce fine lines, wrinkles, spots, redness, improve skin texture and elasticity. When mixed together, hyaluronic acid and niacinamide can improve the overall look of your skin, leaving it rejuvenated, minimizing fine lines and wrinkles.
features/1: COMBAT DEHYDRATION. HA acts like a sponge which draws in water and holds up to 1,000 times its own weight in moisture and gives dehydrated skin a much-needed moisture boost. Niacinamide reduces hyperpigmentation and strengthens the skin barrier - essential for helping the skin retain moisture. Niacinamide and Hyaluronic acid are water-based treatments and they can be paired into your skincare routine, if you suffer from dry, dehydrated or super oily skin.
features/2: NO MORE ACNE. HA is a powerful anti-inflammatory ingredient, which can help treat acne by reducing inflammation. When skin becomes dry and dehydrated, skin cells are not able to shed properly and can lead to clogged pores and acne. Although it has the word acid in it, hyaluronic acid is not an exfoliant like glycolic acid or salicylic acid. Its main use is for hydrating and moisturizing. Niacinamide will help reduce pore size, control oil production and speed up healing of acne scarring.
features/3: SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES. This serum is suited for all skin types. Although hyaluronic acid and niacinamide can be used by all skin types, it’s super beneficial for those with oily and combination skin because of niacinamide’s oil control properties and hyaluronic acid’s lightweight hydration.
features/4: HOW TO USE. Apply a few drops to a clean and dry face in the morning and evening. Follow with a moisturizer. This serum is suited for all skin types. For daytime, finish with a sunscreen SPF 30+. On average, skin improvement is visible after at least 30 days of daily usage.
features/5: NO HARMFUL STUFF. Our product is formulated without parabens, petroleum, phthalates, silicones, sulfates, synthetic fragrances & dyes, SLS/SLES. This product is 100% vegan. We never test on animals. Made in the USA in a FDA registered facility.

description: Tighten, brighten and smooth the skin. Mad Hippie's award-winning serum is a harmonious blend of antioxidants that work wonders on sun damaged skin. Ingredient Highlights: Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate) - Few ingredients in skin care have as much solid evidence as to their effectiveness as Vitamin C. A vital element in the production of collagen, vitamin C can help reduce the appearance of wrinkles and discoloration, while offering antioxidant protection from photo damage. Wear sunscreen daily. Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, a more stable and bioavailable form of Vitamin C than the commonly used L-Ascorbic Acid found in most skin care products, provides the same benefits, without the risk of oxidation and irritation that is often associated with L-Ascorbic Acid. Vitamin E - Protective antioxidant that has been shown to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and discoloration. Ferulic Acid - A natural antioxidant found in the cell walls of plants. When combined with vitamins C and E, Ferulic Acid has been shown to have a compounding antioxidant protective effect. Hyaluronic Acid - Works to plump up the skin and reduce the appearance of wrinkles. A naturally occurring substance in the body, hyaluronic acid begins to deplete as we age. Konjac Root Powder - Exotic flower from Asia, helps to soften and smooth the skin while forming a thin protective barrier. Rich in nutrients such as copper, zinc, phosphorus, fatty acids, protein, carbohydrates, lipids, potassium, magnesium, iron, niacin, folic acid and vitamins A, E, C, D and B. Grapefruit - Rich in antioxidants and citric acid, grapefruit helps to remove dead skin cells, acting as a natural exfoliant. Chamomile Extract - Provides a thin protective shield, while naturally soothing and calming the skin. Clary Sage - Helps eliminate overly-dry or overly-oily skin. Acts as natural toner and astringent.

description: Dr. Dan’s SunBlock SPF30 protects your lips and helps to keep them soft all at the same time. It contains all hypoallergenic ingredients that limit the chemical irritation produced by other sun blocking lip balms. Protect your lips from the harmful rays of the sun and the side effects of sunburn and cancer by using Dr. Dan’s SunBlock SPF30. It took us years to perfect this formula and we are so sure that it will protect your lips from the harshest rays that we offer a 100% money back guarantee. The sun emits radiation in the form of ultraviolet light. The most common rays are UVB and UVA. Both of these rays produce a suntan. UVA produces a cosmetic tan that is short lived. UVB produces a longer lasting tan. Both UVB and UVA can cause damage to your skin but UVB causes sunburn and changes in your skin that can cause cancer. UVA rays do not cause sunburn but can cause skin cancers just as UVB rays do. All sunscreens contain ingredients to block the sun’s UV rays. The amount of protection is indicated by a Sun Protection Factor (SPF). Dermatologists recommend an SPF of 30 or above for an effective sun blocking lip balm. Most lip SPF’s contain either Oxybenzone or some sort of Octisalates. It is well known that these chemicals may cause allergic reactions, (Fisher’s Contact Dermatitis, Fourth Edition chapter 23), and make your lips much worse. Dr. Dan’s SunBlock SPF30 has no such chemicals; instead we use two natural, inert minerals called Titanium dioxide and Zinc Dioxide. These minerals act like tiny mirrors and reflect the UV rays back away from you lips. These tiny protectors are slightly white, which is why Dr. Dan says “if your lips are a little white, they will be alright! In addition, our natural yellow wax and chemical-free base with the antioxidant Vitamin E combine to create the perfect moisturizing combination.
features/0: Dr. Dan’s SunBlock SPF30 protects your lips and helps to keep them soft all at the same time.

Chopsaver 100% natural (The green one) is just that, made from 100% natural and organic ingredients. description: Founded in 1892, the Rosebud Perfume Company set out with a simple mission: To provide simple, multi-usage products that are both affordable and effective. With the creation of the world famous, cult-favorite Rosebud Salve that boasts to be the cure-all for a wide array of skin ailments from blemishes to chapped lips to dry elbows, the family run Rosebud Perfume Company has solidified its place in cosmetic history.   What it is: A cult-favorite, multitasking miracle balm in a convenient tube format.   What it is formulated to do: This beloved multipurpose essential deeply moisturizes and soothes dry lips. Versatile and comforting to skin, it calms and heals irritation, soothes the sting of minor burns, helps heal cuts, tames mangled cuticles, helps fix ashy elbows and knees, and minimizes diaper rash. The slight hint of rose scent adds a delicately aromatic touch without overpowering or cloying.   Ingredients: Cotton Seed Oil, Aromol, Essential Oils, Petrolatum Base.  -Aromol (7 Essential Trade Secret Rose Oils): Heals and adds an aromatic touch. -Petrolatum: Moisturizes and protects against the elements.   Size: Three .05 oz plastic tubes of Original Rosebud Salve

description: Versatile, Nourishing Facial Serum: Pure Formula's Retinol & Niacinamide Facial Serum is a powerful skin care product designed to provide healthy, glowing skin. The properties of retinol and niacinamide are powerful on their own, but when combined, they can do wonders: both ingredients are used in the treatment of acne, hyperpigmentation, signs of aging, rosacea, atopic dermatitis, sun damage repair, discoloration and as a general method of providing vitamin A and vitamin B3 to the skin. This serum can be used both at night or every morning: simply apply over freshly washed skin gently and let the skin absorb it.

description: The Best Lip Balm for the World! Looking for an effective lip balm that will moisturize and protect your lips while minimizing your impact on the environment? You've come to the right place! Hand-crafted from 100% organic and Fair Trade Certified ingredients in our own certified facility located in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. Manufacturing is 100% offset with renewable energy credits. Our Mongo Kiss lip balm line supports a group of women in Zambia, Africa who harvest the Mongongo seeds where the exotic oil is pressed from. It improves skin texture and smoothness, whilst calming any breakouts and reducing excess oils. Zinc is an anti-inflammatory, commonly used to treat burns and scars and fight against free radicals. features/1: AIDS IN DECREASING FINE LINES, WRINKLES & DARK SPOTS, This is all made possible with a pH of 3.27, allowing for chemical exfoliation. Which rids the skin of the old cells and brings fresh skin cells to the surface.

description: Gamma PGA (gPGA) diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, carries moisture, and locks in moisture to give you softer and more youthful skin! Tranexamic acid works from outside the pigmented (darkened) area of the skin working towards the inner until the pigmentation is gone. It also effectively inhibits melanin production while preventing new pigmentation spots and freckles from forming. Licorice contains anti-oxidants, which help protect your skin from sun damage and exposure to the elements. It's a powerful moisturizer for the skin. Licorice soothes your skin and brings it back to life. It is also renowned for its ability to fight acne! Niacinamade is effective in improving skin texture, evening out skin tone and improving appearance of aged, hyperpigmented and photo damaged skin. It also has effective anti-wrinkle properties, reducing the severity of fine lines by stimulating collagen, the connective tissue responsible for skin suppleness. Hyaluronic acid, also known as HA, is a natural compound found in skin that has many important functions, including holding in moisture, providing cushioning, adding in tissue repair, and holding together the skin's structural components (collagen and elastin). Hyaluronic acid holds moisture well-holding up to 1000 times its weight in water. Hyaluronic acid functions not only to deliver water to the skin, but also to hold it there. The loss of natural hyaluronic acid is one of the primary causes of wrinkles, so the idea of putting HA back into the skin to repair wrinkles makes sense! By reducing wrinkles, your skin look younger and evens out skin tone, making it look smooth and supple.

features/0: CAN IT TREAT EXISTING PIGMENTATION? tranexamic acid can treat existing pigmentation effectively and products containing the ingredient are recommended for preventing post-inflammatory pigmentation (PIH), which can be a common side effect of laser treatments.
features/1: HOW EXACTLY DOES IT WORK? it blocks the transfer of pigment from melanocytes (pigment-producing cells) to keratinocytes (the keratin-synthesising cells found in the outermost layer of skin – the epidermis).
features/2: DOES IT MAKE SKIN MORE SENSITIVE TO SUN? Absolutely not. In fact, tranexamic acid decreases the skin’s sensitivity to UV – this is why he ingredient is so popular in Asia and India.
features/3: IF HYPERPIGMENTATION IS A CONCERN, tranexamic acid is an ingredient you'll want to consider. This exciting ingredient helps to visibly fade the look of multiple forms of discolorations including post- acne marks and melasma, which can be particularly stubborn.
features/4: TRANEXAMIC ACID: WHAT TO PAIR IT WITH | Some of the ingredients that will enhance the benefits of tranexamic acid include: salicylic acid, niacinamide, bakuchiol, azelaic acid, vitamin C, and retinol. adds arbutin and licorice acid to that list.

description: Melanin-rich skin is incredible. It glows. It’s beautiful, and it helps to clear skin. Melanin protects your skin cell’s DNA, so you look younger, longer. It protects collagen-producing cells to strengthen the skin. Melanin naturally exists in all skin produced by melanocyte cells. Everyone has a similar amount of melanocyte cells that produce melanin, but it’s the quantity of melanin that these cells produce that varies from person to person. Melanin-rich skin is also not treated by the skin care products we see today. We know one product doesn’t fit all. That’s why we created MELÉ. We understand melanin-rich skin is unique, down to the cellular level. Excess melanin production can create dark spots and signs of aging. That’s why we created a range of skin care products that treat, protect, and nourish your skin. Looking to target and visibly reduce dark spots on your skin? Try MELÉ Even Dark Spot Control Serum. This specially formulated skin care serum reduces the appearance of dark spots to remove impurities. This face serum targets and reduces the appearance of dark spots to reveal radiant, more even skin. How to use: Shake well before each use. Apply to the entire face in the morning or at night after cleansing or a tonic. At a biological level, melanin-rich skin is unique. We’ve worked with scientists, dermatologists, influencers, and consumers of color to develop skincare that starts with the science of melanin-rich skin. We are MELÉ. And we see you.
features/0: TWO IS BETTER THAN ONE: MELÉ Even Dark Spot Control Serum is a bi-phase serum that reduces the appearance of dark spots, targets signs of aging, and helps to clear skin and impurities.
features/1: TARGETS DARK SPOTS: This specially formulated serum features our triple active formula that targets and reduces the appearance of dark spots to enhance and even skin tone.
features/2: FREE FROM: This bi-phase dark spot face serum is free from parabens, alcohol, and mineral oil, and is formulated without phthalates.
features/3: CO-CREATED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS: Our skin is unique. That’s why MELÉ's skin care products were developed with dermatologists who understand at a cellular level the needs of melanin-rich skin.
features/4: DESIGNED FOR YOU: Acne blemishes and overexposure to the sun can cause excess melanin production that could lead to uneven skin. This serum targets dark spots to reveal radiant, even skin.

description: Lean back in your beach chair, paddle out with confidence, and carve the slopes up with our flavored lip balm sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 30 solar protection! No matter the season, you've got a sunscreen chapstick you can rely on. Made responsibly with our oceans in mind, Headhunter sunscreen-infused chapstick is reef safe and chemical-free. Keep your lips hydrated all day long with our zinc oxide sunblock for your lips. Safe for men, women, and children, we implore you to always keep a tube in your back pocket, your car, or your bag. "But what if I leave it in my car overnight and it melts or freezes?" Worry not friend, our sunscreen chapstick is formulated to stay in its desired state in all sorts of weather, hot or cold. Headhunter SPF 30 lip balm goes on clear and smooth and stays that way throughout the day, reapply as needed. description: O’Keeffe’s Lip Repair is hardworking skincare that provides instant relief to extremely dry, cracked lips. O’Keeffe’s Lip Repair is a highly effective lip balm that heals, relieves and repairs extremely dry, cracked lips. When used daily, O’Keeffe’s Lip Repair is clinically proven to provide instant relief and all day moisture in one use, create a flexible barrier and heal dry, cracked lips, protect against dryness all day, even while you eat and drink , and absorb quickly to provide soft, smooth lips. O’Keeffe’s Lip Repair comes in two variants – Original and Cooling Relief. Original is for those who prefer unflavored and unscented. Cooling Relief is for those who enjoy the sensation of peppermint flavor. Both flavors are available in the convenience of a stick or tube form! WHY IT WORKS: O'Keeffe's Lip Repair Lip Balm creates a multi-layer flexible barrier that moves with your lips to help keep dry, cracked lips protected. The lip balm keeps lips moisturized for 8 hours. FOR BEST RESULTS: Apply to lips as needed. Stop use if irritation occurs. Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sun. Click on the O'Keeffe's link at the top of this page to see more products from O'Keeffe's.

description: Salt Range Moisturizing lip balm can help to protect dry lip and reveal natural skin shine. Cherry is famous for its antioxidant and Vitamin C. breadCrumbs: Beauty & Personal Care › Skin Care › Lip Care › Balms & Moisturizers
description: From the heart of the Pacific Northwest comes a lip balm unlike all others - Portland Bee Balm handmade beeswax based lip balm. Our small company crafts an all natural beeswax based balm that soothes, moisturizes and protects your lips with nature, care and love. With a focus on creating a simple and pure product, we make Portland Bee Balm with beeswax from Pacific Northwest hives, adding only select handful of carefully sourced organic and local ingredients in just the right proportion to create not just a great balm, but the BEST balm.Portland Bee Balm Unscented Balm has just what you need and nothing you don't. With just three clean, quality ingredients, there is nothing to overpower your senses allowing you to fully enjoy the light beeswax aroma.It was from Brad’s love of bees, woodworking, and his wife Anika that Portland Bee Balm was born. Anika was searching for a more natural, effective lip balm, and Brad was keeping bees. True to their family's DIY spirit, they took the beeswax from their hives and set out to create a high-quality product that reflected the social and environmental values they hold true. Now, our small team in southeast Portland is spreading those values and bee balms to the wider world.As active participants of the world in which we live, we strive to create meaningful, useful products that are genuinely natural, add value to people’s lives, and help bring awareness to our role in the natural environment.From our ingredients to our packaging to our interactions with customers, we work to be a business that supports the health and well-being of the environment, our community, and of course, bees and their keepers. We are proud to be a One Percent for the Planet member company and have pledged to give one percent of our revenues to Portland Urban Beekeepers Association – helping people to beekeep in urban environments where connection to the natural world is lacking.

description: A face serum set containing Niacinamide and Zinc can be effective in reducing skin blemishes and improving skin texture. Niacinamide is a form of Vitamin B3 that has been shown to reduce inflammation, regulate oil production, and enhance the appearance of enlarged pores, fine lines, and wrinkles. Zinc, on the other hand, is a mineral that has anti-inflammatory properties and can help to regulate sebum production, making it a useful ingredient in reducing blemishes and preventing breakouts. In addition to Niacinamide and Zinc, a good face serum set should also contain Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin B5 for enhanced hydration. Hyaluronic Acid is a powerful humectant that can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water, making it a great ingredient for hydrating the skin. Vitamin B5, also known as Panthenol, is another excellent moisturizing ingredient that can help to soothe and repair damaged skin. When choosing a face serum set, it is important to look for products formulated for your specific skin type and concerns. Additionally, it is always a good idea to patch-test new products before using them on your entire face to ensure that you do not have any adverse reactions. If you have normal skin and are looking for a face serum set, there are several ingredients that can be beneficial for maintaining healthy and radiant skin. Aloe vera is a popular ingredient in skincare products that can help to soothe and hydrate the skin, making it a great addition to a face serum set for normal skin. Other ingredients that can be beneficial for normal skin types include: Vitamin C: This antioxidant can help to brighten the skin, improve skin tone, and protect against environmental stressors. Peptides: These amino acid compounds can help to promote collagen production and improve the skin's elasticity and firmness. Niacinamide: As previously mentioned, this vitamin B3 derivative can help to regulate oil production, reduce inflammation, and improve the appearance of enlarged pore

description: The Hempz lip care product line has been created to treat dry cracking lips but also to ensure a premium all natural lip moisturizer that protects against all unwanted UV rays while hydrating and replenishing. The lip treatment with sunscreen was developed with 100% pure hemp seed oil that helps to reduce fine lines and wrinkles as well as prevent signs of aging. It’s fragranced with a weightless signature citrus fruit extract of yuzu and starfruit that protects and has a pleasant scent. Intended for daily use, our hemp lip balm with SPF 15 guarantees that you are safeguarding your skin against dangerous UVA and UVB rays that can cause extreme burns and damage. The hemp lip treatment is intended to be used daily for the best results. The 0.44 ounce tube of the natural balm is small in size and can be easily taken with you on the go. There is no harm with overuse, in fact, it is encouraged if you want to see the best results. Apply daily after showering, on your way to work to avoid harmful rays, before going to the beach, playing outdoor activities or before going to sleep at night. The Hempz lip treatment is an all natural lip care product that could also be introduced to a friend that is having problems with dry cracking lips or facing challenges with aging. Our product is intended for women and men of all age groups. The 100% all natural lip care system is one of the best solutions on the market for extremely dehydrated and damaged lips. It not only helps, but it also is healthy to use and creates a sheer shine that softens your skin. Product Details: (1) Hempz Yuzu & Starfruit Daily Herbal Lip Balm with SPF 15 Size: 0.44 Ounces.

description: Directions HYALURONIC ACID 2% + B5:Apply a few drops of this face serum in the morning and evening creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.Ingredients:Aqua (Water), Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Panthenol, Ahnfeltia Concinna Extract, Glycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol.Directions NIACINAMIDE 10% + ZINC 1%:Apply to the entire face morning and evening before heavier creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.IMPORTANT: If topical Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid and/or Ethylated L-Ascorbic Acid) is used as part of your skincare routine, it should be applied at alternate times with this formula (ideally Vitamin C in the PM and this formula in the AM). Otherwise, Niacinamide can affect the integrity of the Vitamin C.IngredientsAqua (Water), Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Zinc Pca, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Xanthan Gum, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin. description: Trying to find an anti-aging face serum that not only worked but wouldn’t make my sensitive skin flare became quite a challenge. I eat a nutrient-dense diet, go the gym 3-4 days a week, and get plenty of sleep. Still, my complexion had me a little down in the dumps. I was starting to notice the fine lines, wrinkles, sun damage spots, and redness. I remember my younger days, being able to eat what I want, hang out at the beach all day, and wake up with a glowing complexion. Oh, to be young again. Anyway, I’ve been on the hunt for skincare products that won’t irritate my skin and help minimize some of these skin issues I’ve been dealing with. When I say I tried over 100 skin creams, lotions, tonics, and serums, I’m not kidding. Some were better than others, but most over promised and under delivered. My father was a businessman, so I’ve always had that entrepreneurial spirit inside of me. One day, I figured something would “click,” and I’ll find the inspiration and passion to embark on my own business journey. It did all “click,” and the result is this Niacinamide Serum. My skin has never looked better. I feel like I turned back the clock 15 years! Plus, I have the satisfaction of knowing that I created the product to help achieve this. What Can This Facial Serum Do For Your Skin? Keep skin firm Promote lipid barrier growth Minimize redness & pore size Regulate oil production Protect against sun damage Treat dark spots Smooth fine lines & wrinkles Help build skin cells Banish acne Also, with every purchase, you will get exclusive VIP benefits that you're really going to love. Breathe a sigh of relief; when you click the “Add to Cart” button above, you’ll be taking a big step to getting the complexion you’ve been dreaming about!

description: Niacinamide powder is the water-soluble form of niacin, an essential vitamin of the B group, known as vitamin B3. Purity 99-100 %, pH 6-7.5 (5% water solution). White powder, practically odorless. Easily soluble in water & ethanol, soluble in glycerol. Niacinamide also called nicotinamide, is a form of vitamin B-3. CAS: 98-92-0 INCI Name: Niacinamide Benefits:  Contains only trace amounts of nicotinic acid. Does not cause unpleasant sensations of heat in the skin Can be used at lower pH and not just at pH >5.5 like regular niacinamide Has soothing activity When combined with vitamin A palmitate, niacinamide showed enhanced skin freshness properties Use: Add to the water phase of formula or directly into a finished cream or cream base. The typical concentration is 1-6 %, with 5% being a typical and effective concentration. Avoid adding to an acidic product. Works also at pH level below 5.5. Should not be combined with l-asorbic acid as they can cancel out each other.  Applications: Products for skin, lotions, creams, makeup products. For external use only
features/0: DIY Niacinamide serum keeps your skin firm and smooth.
features/1: Niacinamide powder is one form of vitamin B3 (niacin) that plays an important role in cell health.
features/2: The best plant sources of vitamin B3 (niacin) also called vegan vitamins include yeast, peanuts, muesli, wild rice, corn on the cob and brown rice.

features/0: 【Reduce the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion】Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) is indicated to reduce the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion.Designed to tone down touchiness, reinforce skin’s barrier, and correct and prevent redness caused by acne or rosacea. features/1: 【Brightening skin tone】Independent studies suggest Niacinamide is also an effective ingredient for brightening skin tone. As it affects melanocytes, cells that play a role in pigment formation in the skin.You’ll find the ingredient in products designed to fight discoloration, lessen red marks leftover from acne, and promote a more even skin tone.
features/2: 【Combined with other skin products】Serums are actually one of the best vehicles for niacinamide. This vitamin is water soluble and will most effectively absorb into skin in a serum.But it’s even better when combined with other skin-boosting ingredients.Add a couple drops to a moisturizer you'll fine it helps balance oil production, reduces water loss in skin, and lessens inflammation.
features/3: 【How to choose】An effective product should have 2 to 10% niacinamide. And “niacinamide”—not nicotinic acid. It’s thought that nicotinic acid converts into niacinamide, but nicotinic acid can cause flushing and redness of the skin.Our niacinamide serum selets High purity Nicotinamide with low nicotinic acid (81PPM),It's milder than other Similar products.
features/4: 【How to use】Layer it on correctly: As with any serum, make sure you layer it on after cleansing your skin (to remove makeup, dirt, and oil) and before moisturizer (so it can penetrate the skin more easily.) Serums should also be applied before your SPF in the morning, to ensure the sunscreen can do its job effectively.

description: A powerful niacinamide (Vitamin B3) serum with 12% concentration. Niacinamide has been shown to improve skin moisture and assist in creating even tone and appearance. Niacinamide in concentrations of 5% and greater works to help keep new skin discolorations from appearing. At the same time, it also helps reduce the appearance of existing discolorations, so your skin tone looks more even, bright and more luminous. Higher concentrations of niacinamide can help visibly tighten enlarged pores and often dramatically improving orange peel texture. Hyaluronic acid + B3 can also reduce the appearance and soften wrinkles. Niacinamide is a key ingredient in the arsenal against time and is supported by Hyaluronic Acid and Avocado Oil.
features/0: Formulated to help soften, smooth, and bring balance to skin tone and texture
features/1: Say goodbye to annoying redness in your complexion, B3 is a magical treatment that soothes and calms the redness in the skin caused by blemishes and sensitivities.
features/2: Hyaluronic acid gives your skin a rush of sustainable moisture that lasts all day, plumps the skin and softens wrinkles and fine lines.
features/3: A sun-damaged skin can also become stretched, resulting in an appearance some call "orange peel skin". By strengthening skin's supportive elements, higher concentrations of niacinamide can help tighten pores visibly and sometimes dramatically improve orange peel texture.
features/4: Based on a study conducted on 100 subjects, topical niacinamide 2%+ is found to significantly reduce sebum excretion following two to four weeks of use. It can, therefore, be proven that this vitamin is beneficial for oily skin when used topically.
features/5: In addition to reducing sun damage, hydrating, and fighting wrinkles, niacinamide is also known for reducing acne.

description: Love yourself and get into a skin care routine twice a day. For best results use am/pm serums every morning and every evening. Apply 3-5 drops of each Serum to freshly cleansed skin. Wait 1-2 minutes before applying the next serum. *Always remember sunblock even in the evening as some indoor lights can cause skin damage. Evening only routine should add the retinol Serum starting 3 nights a week. Gradually increase use of retinol use to every evening if skin irritation does not occur.
features/0: Love your skin and start a skincare routine twice a day with our easy to use, 24 hour, Youthful & Radiant Boost kit. Powerful combination of dermatologist tested, cruelty free serums with no added dyes, perfumes, or fragrances that work together to fight against aging around the clock.
features/1: For best results use AM/PM serums every morning and every evening. Apply 3-5 drops of each serum to clean, dry skin on face, neck, and décolleté. When applying each serum use upward circular motions and rub in until fully absorbed. Wait 1-2 minutes before applying the next serum.
features/2: Evening only routine should START with the Anti-Aging Serum (Retinol + Bakuchiol) followed by the 3 AM/PM serums. Apply 3-5 drops to clean, dry skin on face, neck, and décolleté. For best results, apply a moisturizer after serums are fully absorbed.

Art naturals’ Vitamin C serum with hyaluronic acid uses the free-radical battler along with anti-inflammatory champ hyaluronic acid, a major component of skin, where it repairs the damage done by too much sun. Our serum is further enhanced with vitamin e, whose famous antioxidant powers also aid in nourishing skin repair. Science has shown that using skincare products containing both vitamin e and c is more effective in protecting your skin from the sun’s harmful rays than those that contain only one of the two. Your skin looks and feels restored and rejuvenated. Gentle and pure, our Vitamin C serum with hyaluronic acid won’t irritate or cause redness.

Our set features a Vitamin C Brightening Serum, which may help lighten the appearance of dark spots and even out your skin tone. description: Feel like there's something lacking in your skin care regimen? Cleanse, tone, and moisturize, apply sunscreen — these are all three vital steps everyone must take when it comes to skincare. But, unbeknown to most, applying a face serum is an equally important additional step so that your skin may be further protected against the passing of time! But with all the face serums available, it can be challenging to level up your skincare regimen. Well, how about something that features upgraded ingredients and a modernized formula that may help better address signs of aging and other skin problems? Take your skincare routine up a notch with the Vimty Vitamin C Serum for Face with Hyaluronic Acid! Whereas other serums contain standard variants of vitamin C and hyaluronic acid, we decided to take it a step further by using enhanced strains of the said compounds: ethyl ascorbic acid and sodium hyaluronate. Ethyl ascorbic acid is a more stable derivative of vitamin C and may be more effective in promoting collagen synthesis and skin brightening. It also has powerful antioxidative effects that may help protect your skin from damage caused by exposure to the sun and other environmental stressors. On the other hand, sodium hyaluronate has smaller molecules than HA, allowing it to penetrate the skin better and help keep it moisturized and nourished from within. This, in turn, may help in warding off fine lines and wrinkles, while also helping you better manage skin irritation and redness. Still not convinced? Here are more details about our face serum: -Comes in travel-friendly 1-oz. bottles -Non-greasy, lightweight feel -Safe for most skin types Get ready for more youthful and glowing skin. Add the Vimty Vitamin C Serum for Face with Hyaluronic Acid to your cart TODAY!

Vitamin C will enhance the natural formation of collagen of your body that is the number one component for connecting tissues for skin health. Acne causes your skin to develop darkened spots around the affected area. Good thing, this serum vitamin C helps reduce hyperpigmentation and even out your skin tone. It has properties that reduce dark spots without changing your skin color. Plus the hyaluronic acid content which acts like a sponge by attracting moisture to boost hydration on the surface of skin. It is responsible for moisturizing, skin plumping, wound healing, increasing skin elasticity etc. Naturally glow with our face brightening serum and get ready to fight blemishes, fine lines and brightens your complexion. It's a dark spot remover which helps prevent premature aging of the skin, restoring a glowing, smooth appearance to the skin. Although topical vitamin C is generally well tolerated, all skin products have the potential to cause side effects. You should always do a patch test to assess your risk of allergic reaction. Here’s how: 1 .Select a small area of skin that’s easy to conceal, like your forearm. 2. Apply a small amount of product and wait 24 hours. 3 .If no side effects occur, you can apply to your face. Discontinue use if you develop a rash, redness, or hives.

features/0: THE SOLUTION TO DRY DEHYDRATED SKIN – If you want plumper, softer, smoother skin—with less fine lines and chronic dry patches, there's only one skincare ingredient you truly need: hyaluronic acid. Hyaluronic acid (HA) is a substance found naturally in our skin that holds water and helps keep it hydrated and plump.
features/1: HA DECREASES NATURALLY AS YOU AGE – Just like collagen and elastin, the amount of naturally-occurring hyaluronic acid in our bodies decreases as we get older, which is why it’s vital to add a HA serum to your daily routine. Unveil your true beautiful hydrated skin with our effective moisturizing hyaluronic acid serum, which puts powerful natural ingredients to work – all for a fresher, brighter & smoother complexion.
features/2: REDUCE APPEARANCE OF FINE LINES AND WRINKLES - Hyaluronic acid’s moisture-binding properties is ultimately imperative when it comes to skin aging. Because of its ability to draw and hold water it makes skin appear more dewy and smoother by improving skin elasticity. HA is surprisingly very gentle and helpful for all skin types. We often recommend those starting out with skin care products to always choose a hyaluronic acid serum because it’s easy on the skin, and results are quick to see.
features/3: OUR HYALURONIC ACID IS VEGAN – Our botanical HA is natural and vegan and derived from the seeds of the Senna plant! When applied to the skin our botanical hyaluronic acid creates a breathable, protective layer on the skin that draws moisture in, helps boost the elasticity and hydration levels of the skin. In turn, you’ll notice a firmer, more toned and plump appearance to the skin which naturally minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
features/4: HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Formulated with only the highest quality natural, vegan & organic ingredients, and nothing more. We’ve chosen not to compromise the formula with added chemicals to artificially hide normal variations in the color of the ingredients, or perfumes to cover up their natural scent.
title: Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C For Face, Hydrate and Plump Dry Skin, Boost Collagen, Anti Aging Diminish Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Natural & Organic Vegan Ingredients, 1 fl oz

description: Healthy Age Solutions Skin Nourishing Vitamin C Serum (SN-S10A) is a 10% Vitamin C Serum for Face & Body with Hyaluronic Acid plus Witch Hazel Extract, and other listed ingredients. The serum is contained in an airless bottle.Directions: Slowly press the pump to prevent squirting. Always do a patch test and wait for 24 hours before using it for the first time. Liberally apply to clean, gently-dried skin twice daily. Be sure to apply skin care products with clean hands. If you have dry skin, please use a moisturizer for dry skin afterward. For maximum results, use a quality sunscreen product throughout the day of at least SPF 15 to protect your skin. Store in a cool dry place, away from excessive heat and cold.  About HAS: Healthy Aging is a Youthful Living. Aging does not necessarily mean getting old. From the day we are born, we are aging or undergoing natural processes of change. As we age, we are using products that make us looks better, smell better, and feel better but we are totally ignoring the bad effects of these products on our body. That is why we provide solutions that make your everyday living a youthful journey done in a safe way. These are our guiding values. - We never give exaggerated claims. What you see is what you get. - We are green. That's right, we are environmentally friendly. - Our products are never tested on animals. - Our products are Paraben-Free, Gluten-Free, Phthalate-Free, and Non-GMO. - Our products are simple but highly effective. - We believe everyone is beautiful and we do not discriminate.  Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
features/0: 10% VITAMIN C SERUM for Face & Body - Vitamin C is a science-backed, dermatologist-favorite ingredient that may help slow early skin aging, prevent sun damage, and improve the appearance of wrinkles, dark spots, and acne. Vitamin C can help fade pigmentation and smooth the skin’s surface to reduce dullness. Vitamin C acts as a radical scavenger, with a high capacity to reduce damages caused by photo-oxidation and lipid peroxidation.
features/1: with HYALURONIC ACID - Hyaluronic Acid is the main component of what gives your skin structure, and is responsible for that plump and hydrated look. Hyaluronic Acid functions as a humectant and holds water molecules onto the surface of your skin to keep it nice and hydrated. Hyaluronic Acid enhances the penetration of the active ingredient through the stratum corneum, which behaves as a barrier to the entry of the molecule into the deeper layers of the skin.
features/2: with WITCH HAZEL EXTRACT - Witch Hazel Extract is proven to inhibit Intracellular ROS Production and has a cytoprotective effect against skin oxidative stress. Witch Hazel is rich in tannins, a natural plant compound with powerful antioxidant properties that can help protect your skin against damage when applied topically.
features/3: TOXIN FREE - This formulation is Paraben Free, Gluten Free, GMO-Free, Phthalate Free, and Cruelty-Free.
features/4: POTENT & AUTHENTIC - We carefully selected our products from certified and authentic sources to give you potent ingredients to start with. Our products are made from a third-party US State-regulated facility and issued with a Certificate of Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) by the Independent Beauty Association. Our products are simple but highly effective. We never give exaggerated claims. What you see is what you get.

description: L'Oreal Paris Anti-Aging Serum Day/Night Skin Care Kit comes with 2 Revitalift Derm Intensives favorites - 1.5% Pure Hyaluronic Acid Facial Serum and Night Serum with 0.3% Pure Retinol. Start your morning with Revitalift Hyaluronic acid serum for long-lasting hydration and instant plumping effect. In the evening apply Revitalift Retinol serum to visibly reduce wrinkles and even tone. You can also use Revitalift Hyaluronic acid serum at night before Retinol serum for additional hydration. What Does Hyaluronic Acid Do? Hyaluronic Acid is naturally produced by our bodies and plays a critical role in skin’s youthful look. It’s natural production rapidly decreases as early late 20’s and must be topically supplied as a key step after cleansing. Hyaluronic acid is a big molecule and it needs to be adapted to be absorbed by the skin in order to be effective. The formula has been designed to provide a dual plumping and hydration effect by combining hyaluronic acid of both high and low molecular weight. 0.5% High Molecular Weight Hyaluronic Acid will remain on top of the skin, without a tacky feeling, to help lock-in moisture for dewy-looking skin. 1% Low Molecular Weight Hyaluronic Acid absorbs more easily to help smooth skin texture and instantly replump skin. This formula has also been developed and tested to be safe for sensitive skin. What is Revitalift Retinol Serum? It is our most potent and has our highest concentration of Pure Retinol. So effective, in a clinical study, 100% of women showed reduction in wrinkles, even deep ones. Pure Retinol is a top dermatologist recommended anti-aging ingredient proven to fight key signs of aging such as wrinkles, even deep ones. With many retinols available in skincare, look for those that say Pure.
features/0: Anti-Aging Day Night Serum Duo - our two Derm Intensives Icons, Morning- use 1.5 percent Pure Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum to hydrate and replump- Night use 0.3 percent Retinol Serum to visibly Reduce wrinkles, even deep ones

description: Featuring an exciting new form of vitamin A, Mad Hippie's groundbreaking serum works to exfoliate the skin, improving the appearance of sun damaged, aging skin.  Ingredient Highlights:   HPR: Revolutionary new form of vitamin A that is bioavailable in its current state without the need of any inefficient metabolic steps (retinol requires 2). Works to dramatically reduce the appearance of wrinkles and discoloration, revealing beautiful, youthful skin.  Phytoceramide: Aids in moisture retention, leading to more plumped up, hydrated skin. Sodium Hyaluronate: The salt of hyaluronic acid (HA), sodium hyaluronate, has been shown to have better skin penetrating capabilities than HA alone. Helps to plump up and moisturize the skin while reducing the appearance of wrinkles.  Oat Beta Glucan: Naturally hydrates and soothes the skin. Oat beta glucan has been shown reduce the appearance of wrinkles while also having a tightening effect.  Alpha Lipoic Acid: A powerful antioxidant with anti-inflammatory qualities that has been shown to reduce the appearance of wrinkles.  Aloe Vera - Skin protectant believed to increase the availability of oxygen to the skin.  Full Ingredient List: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Glycerin, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Vitamin A (HPR:Hydroxypinacolone Retinoate), Phenethyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Glycerin, Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera Oil), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Citric Acid, Steam Distilled Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil, Oat Beta-Glucan, Phytoceramide (Soybean Palmitate), Acetyl Glucosamine
